Posts.Content: THE SUNLIGHT BOTHER ME WHEN I WENT THROUGHT MY CHEMO TREATMENTS ALSO. THEY TOLD ME THAT IT WAS A SIDEFFECT OF THE AC TREATMENTS AND TO STAY OUT OF THE SUNLIGHT AND WERE SUNGLASS. BUT THEY WILL GET BETTER.
